## Configure file sharing\nMedia files a.orig:
## Configure file sharing
Media files are too large to be sent directly to your peers. Consequently, MyContexts puts them in a place that you have write rights to, and from which your peers can read.
As MyContexts is totally distributed, we cannot provide you with a central place to put the media files that all MyContexts users want to share.
However, you can easily set up your own storage. Currently we support the cloud service Mega. The company offers you a free account with 20Gb of storage.
Sign up at the [Mega website](https://mega.nz/). Write down your username and password and enter them below. Write "mega" in the field 'StorageType' and you are all set.
Rest assured: these credentials will never leave your computer (except to authenticate with Mega)! Such is the inherent safety of a truly distributed program such as MyContexts.
## Configure file sharing\nMedia files a.en:
## Configure file sharing
 Media files are too large to be sent directly to your peers. Consequently, MyContexts puts them in a place that you have write rights to, and from which your peers can read.
 As MyContexts is totally distributed, we cannot provide you with a central place to put the media files that all MyContexts users want to share. 
 However, you can easily set up your own storage. Currently we support the cloud service Mega. The company offers you a free account with 20Gb of storage. 
 Sign up at the [Mega website](https://mega.nz/). Write down your username and password and enter them below. Write "mega" in the field 'StorageType' and you are all set. 
 Rest assured: these credentials will never leave your computer (except to authenticate with Mega)! Such is the inherent safety of a truly distributed program such as MyContexts.
## Configure file sharing\nMedia files a.nl:
## Configureer bestandsdeling
 Media bestanden zijn te groot om direct naar uw collega's te sturen. Daarom plaatst MyContexts ze op een plek waar u schrijfrechten heeft, en waar uw collega's ze kunnen lezen.
 Omdat MyContexts volledig gedistribueerd is, kunnen we u geen centrale plek bieden om de media bestanden te plaatsen die alle MyContexts gebruikers willen delen. 
 U kunt echter eenvoudig uw eigen opslag instellen. Momenteel ondersteunen we de cloud service Mega. Het bedrijf biedt u een gratis account met 20Gb opslag. 
 Meld u aan op de [Mega website](https://mega.nz/). Schrijf uw gebruikersnaam en wachtwoord op en voer ze hieronder in. Schrijf "mega" in het veld 'StorageType' en u bent klaar. 
 Wees gerust: deze gegevens zullen uw computer nooit verlaten (behalve om te authenticeren met Mega)! Zo is de inherente veiligheid van een echt gedistribueerd programma zoals MyContexts.

## Your own Shared File Service\nThis is.orig:
## Your own Shared File Service
This is the Shared File Service that you have set up for your installation. Media files that you include in chats will be uploaded to this service.
## Your own Shared File Service\nThis is.nl:
## Uw eigen Shared File Service
 Dit is de Shared File Service die u hebt ingesteld voor uw installatie. Mediabestanden die u in chats opneemt, worden ge√ºpload naar deze service.
## Your own Shared File Service\nThis is.en:
## Your own Shared File Service
 This is the Shared File Service that you have set up for your installation. Media files that you include in chats will be uploaded to this service.

## Shared File Server currently in use\n.orig:
## Shared File Server currently in use
This is the actual shared file server that your installation uses to upload files.
By default, it will be a location provided by the Perspectives project.
You can use it to upload a limited number of files to get you started.
When you exceed that limit, a warning will be shown.
## Shared File Server currently in use\n.nl:
## Gedeelde bestandsserver momenteel in gebruik
 Dit is de daadwerkelijke gedeelde bestandsserver die uw installatie gebruikt om bestanden te uploaden.
 Standaard is het een locatie die wordt aangeboden door het Perspectives-project.
 U kunt het gebruiken om een beperkt aantal bestanden te uploaden om u op weg te helpen.
 Wanneer u die limiet overschrijdt, wordt er een waarschuwing weergegeven.
## Shared File Server currently in use\n.en:
## Shared File Server currently in use
 This is the actual shared file server that your installation uses to upload files.
 By default, it will be a location provided by the Perspectives project.
 You can use it to upload a limited number of files to get you started.
 When you exceed that limit, a warning will be shown.
